name: Rocket Blast (tfrederick1)
description:
Controls: Up Arrow - Fire Rocket Booster, Side Arrows - Rotate Rocket (Force Based)

Details:

Navigate a rocket around obstacles and to the goal :D

All art and animation was created by me using Graphics Gale.

Tips:

  • Use short bursts to best control the rocket
  • Because the rotation is force based, in order to stop the rocket from spinning you must rotate the rocket in the opposite direction.
  • The struts of the rocket are indestructible so you can use them to brace your impact if you are going to hit the wall.

To Do:

  • Create a level select menu / options menu
  • Implement sound / music
  • Bug fixes
